name: Xournal++ Notebook
summary: Learn about .XOPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Xournal++ is a free notetaking application, available for Windows, macOS, and Linux, that simulates a real-life notebook. Xournal++ users can take notes, doodle, insert images, and even highlight and annotate their text, just as they would when using a real notebook.

Each Xournal++ notebook (which may consist of any number of pages) is saved within a XOPP file. If Xournal++ users want to share their notebook(s) with another Xournal++ user, they can do so by giving that user their XOPP file(s).
